name: ABS
description: Write a macro, named ABS, that replaces an argument with an absolute value

name: my_params_to_array
description: Write a function that stores the program’s parameters into an array of structures and returns the address of the array’s first cell. All array elements are to be addressed, including av[0].

name: my_show_param_array
description: Write a function that displays the content of an array created with the previous function.

name: get_color
prototype: int get_color(unsigned char red, unsigned char green, unsigned char blue);
description: Write a function that returns the color as an int by handling its three RGB components

name: swap_endian_color
description: Write a function that changes the endianness of the color and returns it. The color should be ordered like this : ARGB
